front.title: Definitions of Tests for ATM Management

abstract.t: This memo defines a portion of the Management Information Base (MIB) for use with network management protocols in the Internet community. In particular, it describes objects used for managing ATM-based interfaces, devices, networks and services in addition to those defined in the ATM MIB [RFC2515], to provide support for the management of on-demand ATM Loopback Tests.
